perturbation.original_text:
7.   TERM

7.1  This Agreement shall take effect from the Effective Date and continue in
     full force and effect for twenty (20) years thereafter, unless otherwise
     terminated in accordance with Clause 8.

7.2  This Agreement may be renewed for an additional term of ten (10) years by
     notice in writing given by XFN to CEIS at the expiry of the Term, for a
     consideration to be mutually agreed.
perturbation.changed_text:
7.   TERM

7.1  This Agreement shall take effect from the Effective Date and continue in
     full force and effect for twenty (20) years thereafter, unless otherwise
     terminated in accordance with Clause 8.

7.2  This Agreement may be renewed for an additional term of ten (10) years by
     notice in writing given by XFN to CEIS at the expiry of the Term, at no additional consideration.
perturbation.explanation: Clause 7.2 originally states renewal will occur for a consideration to be mutually agreed. This change introduces ambiguity by changing 'for a consideration to be mutually agreed.' to 'at no additional consideration'. This would create a dispute as to whether the renewal required new terms of consideration or would be automatically done at no additional cost to XFN.

perturbation.original_text:
8.   TERMINATION

8.1  XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice
     to the CEIS.

8.2  Either Party may terminate this Agreement:

     (a)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
           is not capable of being remedied;

     (b)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
           is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days
           upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring
           remedy; and

     (c)  if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.

8.3  Upon termination of the Agreement:

     (a)  CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate
           effect; and

     (b)  in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of
           the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the
           unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date
           those sums were paid until the date of full refund.
perturbation.changed_text:
8.   TERMINATION

8.1  XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice
     to the CEIS.

8.2  Either Party may terminate this Agreement:

     (a)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
           is not capable of being remedied;

     (b)  if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which
           is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days
           upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring
           remedy; and

     (c)  if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.

8.3  Upon termination of the Agreement:

     (a)  CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content within 180 days effect; and

     (b)  in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of
           the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the
           unexpired Term of this Agreement, without interest.
perturbation.explanation: The clause 8.3a previously stated CEIS should terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate effect. This was changed to 180 days. Further, Clause 8.3b originally stated with interest but now, without interest. The two edits make it unclear as to the timeline in which the CEIS should stop transmission and whether it is necessary to pay back XFN with interest.

perturbation.original_text:
1.   DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION

1.1  In this Agreement unless the context otherwise requires the following words
     shall have the following meaning:

                 "AFFILIATES"       means any company, corporation, partnership, joint venture or
                    other entity that directly or indirectly controls, is
                    controlled by or is under common control with XFN;

"CONTENT"          means real-time economic news including articles, reports,
                    data, information and such materials that have or have been
                    and/or will be published from time to time and that is or
                    will be in the possession or control of CEIS from time to
                    time, in respect of the subject matters as more particularly
                    described in Schedule 1;

EFFECTIVE DATE     means 18 May 2000;

"INTELLECTUAL      means patents, trade marks, service marks, trade names,
PROPERTY RIGHTS"   design rights (whether registrable or not), any applications
                    for the foregoing, copyright and other assignable

                                      -1-

                                    rights (whether registrable or not) in any country, including
                    but not limited to the format, layout, and the look and feel
                    of any of the Content;

"TERM"             means the term as set out in Clause 7; and

"TERRITORY"        means the world excluding the People's Republic of China.

1.2  Words importing the singular number shall include the plural and vice
     versa.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.   DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION

1.1  In this Agreement unless the context otherwise requires the following words
     shall have the following meaning:

                 "AFFILIATES"       means any company, corporation, partnership, joint venture or
                    other entity that directly or indirectly controls, is
                    controlled by or is under common control with XFN;

"CONTENT"          means real-time economic news including articles, reports,
                    data, information and such materials that have or have been
                    and/or will be published from time to time and that is or
                    will be in the possession or control of CEIS from time to
                    time, in respect of the subject matters as more particularly
                    described in Schedule 1;

EFFECTIVE DATE     means 18 May 2000;

"INTELLECTUAL      means patents, trade marks, service marks, trade names,
PROPERTY RIGHTS"   design rights (whether registrable or not), any applications
                    for the foregoing, copyright and other assignable rights, excluding the content format and layout.

                                      -1-

                                    rights (whether registrable or not) in any country, including
                    but not limited to the format, layout, and the look and feel
                    of any of the Content;

"TERM"             means the term as set out in Clause 7; and

"TERRITORY"        means the world excluding the People's Republic of China.

1.2  Words importing the singular number shall include the plural and vice
     versa.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) is amended to exclude content format and layout at the beginning. However, the definition goes on to include them later. This is an internal contradiction which creates uncertainty as to what exactly XFN is licensed to use and protect.
